Module com.example.navalbattle
Package com.example.navalbattle.models

Class GamePersistenceModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.navalbattle.models.GamePersistenceModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
GamePersistenceInterface
public class GamePersistenceModel extends Object implements GamePersistenceInterface
Handles the persistence of the game state for a single match in the Battleship game. This class is responsible for saving and loading the game state to allow players to resume from their last saved position. The class operates by serializing a single MatchStatusSerializable instance which represents the boards of both the player and the machine.

    • deserialize

      public MatchStatusSerializable deserialize() throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      Deserializes the match status from a saved file and returns it.
      Specified by:
      deserialize in interface GamePersistenceInterface
      Returns:
      the deserialized MatchStatusSerializable object representing the saved match state.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class for the object cannot be found.
      IOException - if there is an issue reading the file.

    • takeSnapshot

      public void takeSnapshot(MainTable mainTable, PositionTable positionTable)
      Takes a snapshot of the current game state by saving the match status. The snapshot is then serialized to store the current state.
      Specified by:
      takeSnapshot in interface GamePersistenceInterface
      Parameters:
      mainTable - the game board of the machine
      positionTable - the game board of the player
